Submodules¶

miniChemistry.MiniChemistryException module¶

exception miniChemistry.MiniChemistryException.MiniChemistryException(variables: dict)¶

Bases: Exception

The exception hierarchy here is quite simple. Every (almost) package has its own Exceptions file so that we can easily track from where did the exception come from. All exceptions start from this one – MiniChemistryException, because this one contains an important parameter self._relevant_variables. It is printed by any exception so that we can immediately see without debugging what values the variables had.

exception miniChemistry.MiniChemistryException.NoArgumentForFunction(function_name: str, variables: dict)¶

Bases: MiniChemistryException

exception miniChemistry.MiniChemistryException.NotSupposedToHappen(variables: dict)¶

Bases: MiniChemistryException
